description.english: Complete your first Dream Eater sequence.
description.spanish: Completa tu primera secuencia del devorasueños.
description.french: Terminez votre première séquence avec le Mange-rêve.
description.italian: Completa la tua prima sequenza con il mangiasogni.
description.japanese: ドリームイーターのシーケンスを始めて完了する。
description.koreana: 첫 번째 드림 이터 시퀀스를 완료하세요.
description.brazilian: Conclua sua primeira sequência de devorador de sonhos.
description.schinese: 完成首次食梦者序列。

description.spanish: Sobrevive al trapware de Adam.
description.french: Survivez au programme piège d'Adam.
description.italian: Sopravvivi alla trappola software di Adam.
description.japanese: アダムのトラップウェアを切り抜ける。
description.brazilian: Sobreviva à armadilha de Adam.
description.schinese: 从亚当的陷阱软件中存活

description.spanish: Acepta a Adam.
description.french: Acceptez Adam.
description.italian: Accetta Adam.
description.japanese: アダムを抱擁する。
description.brazilian: Aceite Adam.
description.schinese: 接受亚当。

description.spanish: Rechaza a Adam.
description.french: Rejetez Adam.
description.italian: Respingi Adam.
description.japanese: アダムを拒絶する。
description.brazilian: Rejeite Adam.
description.schinese: 拒绝亚当。

displayName.japanese: ボディ・スナッチャー

description.english: Decide the fate of the merging minds.
description.german: Bestimme über das Schicksal der verschmelzenden Geister.
description.spanish: Decide el destino de las mentes fusionadas.
description.french: Décidez du sort des esprits en fusion.
description.italian: Decidi la sorte delle menti unite.
description.japanese: 融合する精神の運命を決する。
description.brazilian: Decida o destino das mentes em fusão.
description.schinese: 决定思维融合者的命运。

description.english: Decide the fate of the organ farm.
description.german: Bestimme über das Schicksal der Organfarm.
description.spanish: Decide el destino de la granja de órganos.
description.french: Décidez du sort de la culture d'organes.
description.italian: Decidi la sorte della fabbrica di organi.
description.japanese: 臓器培養装置の運命を決する。
description.brazilian: Decida o destino da fazenda de órgãos.
description.schinese: 决定器官农场的命运。

description.spanish: Descodifica la figurita de Adam.
description.french: Décryptez la figurine d'Adam.
description.italian: Decifra la statuetta di Adam.
description.japanese: アダムの置物の暗号を解読する
description.brazilian: Descriptografe a estatueta de Adam.
description.schinese: 解密亚当的人偶。

description.german: Schließe das Spiel ab, ohne zu sterben.
description.spanish: Termina el juego sin morir.
description.french: Terminez le jeu sans mourir.
description.italian: Termina il gioco senza morire.
description.japanese: 一度も死亡せずにゲームをクリアする。
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo sem morrer.
description.russian: Пройдите игру, ни разу не погибнув.
description.schinese: 在未死亡情况下完成游戏。

description.spanish: Interroga a los clientes de Amir.
description.french: Interrogez les clients d'Amir.
description.italian: Interroga i clienti di Amir.
description.japanese: アミルの顧客を尋問する。
description.brazilian: Interrogue os clientes de Amir.
description.schinese: 审问阿米尔的客户。

description.english: Find all RC cars and recall a memory of Adam.
description.german: Finde alle Funkautos und rufe eine Erinnerung an Adam wach.
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los coches teledirigidos y ten un recuerdo de Adam.
description.french: Trouvez toutes les voitures radiocommandées et récupérez un souvenir d'Adam.
description.italian: Trova tutte le automobiline e rievoca un ricordo di Adam.
description.japanese: ラジコンカーを全て見つけ、アダムの思い出を振り返る。
description.koreana: 모든 RC 자동차를 찾고 Adam의 기억을 불러오세요.
description.polish: Odnajdź wszystkie modele zdalnie sterowanych aut i przywołaj wspomnienie Adama.
description.brazilian: Encontre todos os carros de controle remoto e relembre uma memória de Adam.
description.russian: Найдите все машинки с дистанционным управлением и верните воспоминание Адама.
description.schinese: 找到所有遥控车，唤醒关于亚当的记忆。

displayName.spanish: La raíz de todos los males
displayName.french: La source de tous les maux
displayName.italian: La radice di tutti i mali
displayName.brazilian: A origem de todo o mal

description.english: Find and listen to all patient interview recordings.
description.german: Finde alle Aufnahmen der Patientengespräche und höre sie an.
description.spanish: Encuentra y escucha todas las grabaciones con entrevistas de pacientes.
description.french: Trouvez et écoutez tous les enregistrements des entretiens avec les patients.
description.italian: Trova le registrazioni delle sedute dei pazienti e ascoltale.
description.japanese: 患者のインタビューの記録を全て見つけ、聞く。
description.koreana: 모든 환자 인터뷰 녹음을 찾은 후 들으세요.
description.polish: Odnajdź i przesłuchaj wszystkie wywiady z pacjentami.
description.brazilian: Encontre e ouça todas as gravações de entrevistas de pacientes.
description.russian: Найдите и прослушайте все записи разговоров с пациентами.
description.schinese: 找到并听取所有病人面试录音。

description.english: Find all roses and discover the final resting place.
description.german: Finde alle Rosen und den Ort der letzten Ruhe.
description.spanish: Encuentra todas las rosas y descubre el lugar de descanso eterno.
description.french: Trouvez toutes les roses et découvrez la dernière demeure.
description.italian: Trova tutte le rose e scopri il luogo dell'ultimo riposo.
description.japanese: バラを全て見つけ、安住の場所を発見する
description.koreana: 모든 장미를 찾고 마지막 안식처를 발견하세요.
description.polish: Odnajdź wszystkie róże i odkryj miejsce pochówku.
description.brazilian: Encontre todas as rosas e descubra o local do descanso final.
description.russian: Найдите все розы и последнее пристанище.
description.schinese: 找到所有玫瑰花并发现最终安息之所。

description.spanish: Encuentra 10 tarjetas de pacientes con nanofagia.
description.french: Trouvez 10 cartes de patient du nanophage.
description.italian: Trova le schede di 10 pazienti affetti da nanofagia.
description.japanese: ナノファージ患者のカルテを10枚見つける。
description.brazilian: Encontre 10 cartões de pacientes de nanofagia.
description.schinese: 找到10张纳米吞噬病人卡片。

description.english: Find all nanophage patient cards in a single playthrough.
description.spanish: Encuentra todas las tarjetas de pacientes con nanofagia.
description.french: Trouvez toutes les cartes de patient du nanophage.
description.italian: Trova tutte le schede dei pazienti affetti da nanofagia.
description.japanese: ナノファージ患者のカルテを全て見つける。
description.polish: Znajdź wszystkie karty pacjentów Nanofagium w jednym podejściu.
description.brazilian: Encontre todos os cartões de pacientes de nanofagia.
description.russian: Найдите все карты пациентов с нанофагом.
description.schinese: 找到全部纳米吞噬病人卡片。

description.spanish: Intenta interrogar a 20 inquilinos.
description.french: Essayez d'interroger 20 locataires.
description.italian: Prova a interrogare 20 inquilini.
description.japanese: 住民20人に対し尋問を試みる。
description.brazilian: Tente interrogar 20 inquilinos.
description.schinese: 尝试对20名租户进行审问。

description.spanish: Ten una sobredosis de sincrozina.
description.french: Faites une overdose de pilules de synchronisation.
description.italian: Vai in overdose di Sincrozine.
description.japanese: 同調用の薬を過剰摂取する。
description.brazilian: Tenha uma overdose de pílulas de sincronização.
description.schinese: 服用同步药片至过量。

description.english: Earn 3000 points during a single trapware run.
description.german: Verdiene 3000 Punkte bei einer einzigen Fallensoftware-Ausführung.
description.spanish: Consigue 3000 puntos durante una sola carrera de trapware.
description.french: Gagnez 3 000 points en une seule exécution de programme piège.
description.italian: Guadagna 3.000 punti in una sola sessione con la trappola software.
description.japanese: 1回のトラップウェア・ランで3000ポイント獲得する。
description.brazilian: Obtenha 3.000 pontos durante uma única corrida de armadilhas.
description.russian: Заработайте 3000 очков за один проход в ловушке.
description.schinese: 在单次陷阱软件中获得3000分。

description.spanish: Analiza 100 objetos.
description.french: Analysez 100 objets.
description.italian: Analizza 100 oggetti.
description.japanese: 100個のオブジェクトを分析する。
description.brazilian: Analise 100 objetos.
description.schinese: 分析100个物体。

description.english: Complete all With Fire And Sword: Spiders arcade games
description.german: Schließe alle Arcade-Spiele „Mit Feuer und Schwert: Spinnen“ ab.
description.spanish: Completa todos los juegos arcade de Con fuego y acero: Arañas.
description.french: Terminez tous les jeux d'arcade Tout feu tout flamme : Araignées.
description.italian: Completa tutti i giochi arcade di A ferro e fuoco: Ragni.
description.japanese: 全てのアーケードゲーム「炎と剣を以て: クモ軍団襲来」をクリアする。
description.koreana: 모든 With Fire and Sword: Spiders 아케이드 게임을 완료하세요.
description.polish: Ukończ wszystkie gry z serii With Fire and Sword: Spiders
description.brazilian: Conclua todos os jogos Com Fogo e Espada: Aranhas.
description.russian: Пройдите все игры «Огнем и мечом: пауки»
description.schinese: 完成所有用火与剑：蜘蛛街机游戏

description.german: Finde das Schicksal der Liebhaber heraus.
description.spanish: Descubre el sino de los amantes.
description.french: Découvrez l'histoire des amants.
description.italian: Scopri il destino dell’amante.
description.japanese: 想い人の安否を確かめる。
description.brazilian: Descubra o destino dos amantes.
description.schinese: 爱人预言

description.english: Find the source of the distress call
description.spanish: Encuentra el origen de la señal de auxilio.
description.french: Trouver la source du signal de détresse.
description.italian: Trova la sorgente della richiesta di soccorso.
description.japanese: 救難連絡⁠の発⁠生⁠源⁠を見⁠つ⁠け⁠る。
description.brazilian: Encontre a fonte da chamada de emergência.
description.schinese: 找到奇怪呼叫的来源。

description.spanish: Sé testigo de un momento perdido.
description.french: Assistez à un moment perdu.
description.italian: Testimone di un momento perduto.
description.japanese: 失われた瞬間を目撃する。
description.brazilian: Testemunhe um momento perdido.
description.schinese: 失落的见证

description.english: Find out the true reason behind the hanged man's death
description.german: Finde die wahre Ursache für den Tod des Gehängten.
description.spanish: Descubre el verdadero motivo del suicidio del ahorcado.
description.french: Trouvez la véritable raison de la mort du pendu.
description.italian: Scopri il vero motivo dietro alla morte dell’uomo impiccato.
description.japanese: 首を吊った男の死因の真相を突き止める。
description.koreana: 교수형 당한 남자의 죽음에 대한 진실을 알아내라.
description.brazilian: Descubra o verdadeiro motivo por trás da morte do enforcado.
description.schinese: 查清上吊男子死亡的真相。
